item.title: INFINITY BULLETS launches this summer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/infinity-bullets-launches-this-summer

  • Smartphone

New trailer released for multi-directional shoot 'em up game.

Multi-directional shoot ’em up game INFINITY BULLETS will launch for iOS and Android this summer, developer HEXADRIVE announced. It will be free-to-play with in-app purchases.

Here are the latest details:

One-of-a-Kind Survivor Experience That Inherits the DNA of 90s Shooters

INFINITY BULLETS offers a completely new game experience that combines the game genre “survivor” play feel popular today with the essence of 90s arcade shooters.

The exhilarating action of knocking down enemies one after another with rapid-fire attacks and the thrilling gameplay of subduing swarms of enemies with high firepower will be nostalgic for fans of yesteryear and fresh for younger players.

First Appearance of New Characters Karen, $mash, and Sharifa

In the newest trailer, Karen, $mash, and Sharifa make their first appearance as playable characters.

They have different armaments and skills from the standard character Max, allowing for a greater variety of play styles. These unique new characters will further broaden the scope of strategy and gameplay in the future.

Giant Bosses Will Join the Game in Earnest, Offering a New Battle Experience

Unique and powerful boss characters that were not shown last year will also appear in this title. The battle that unfolds across the screen is visually impactful, creating an exciting battle experience that is “new and nostalgic.”
